content: I'm glad you mentioned restocking on gym supplies. By the way, I've been really enjoying my new earbuds, which I've been using daily, especially during my morning commutes. They're so much better than my old ones. Anyway, back to my gym bag... I'm thinking of adding a small first-aid kit with essentials like band-aids, antiseptic wipes, and pain relievers. Do you have any recommendations on what else I should include in my gym bag's first-aid kit?
